channel.title: Rstats on Tristan's website

item.title: Use R! 2014 to be at UCLA
item.description: The 2014 Use R! conference will be in Los Angeles, CA and will be hosted by the UCLA Department of Statistics (an excellent department, I must say) and the newly created Foundation for Open Access Statistics. This is basicallyÂ the meeting for R users and developers and has grown to be quite an event.
